text: Cristian David Echavarría Vélez (born 10 July 1997 in Antioquia, Colombia) is a Colombian professional footballer who plays for Jaguares de Córdoba on loan from Independiente Medellín. ==Career== ===Club=== In June 2017, Echavarría signed for SJK. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Independiente Medellín footballers Category:Wisła Kraków players Category:Venados F.C. players Category:Seinäjoen Jalkapallokerho players Category:FC Honka players Category:Patriotas Boyacá footballers Category:Jaguares de Córdoba footballers Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland
title: Cristian Echavarría
